description: The apparent intervention from Pope Benedict came as Pope Francis considers an easing of the rules.
title: Retired Pope to be removed as celibacy book author
title_page: Retired Pope to be removed as celibacy book author - BBC News
maintext: Cardinal Robert Sarah tweeted (in French) that in light of the controversy the publication had provoked, it had been decided that in future the named author would be himself alone, with the contribution of Benedict XVI noted. The text would remain completely unchanged, he said.
